title: Bug 45145: Second window comes to front when using first
OB: When using the first window, the second window should not come to the front unless the user explicitly clicks on it or some behavior takes them to a widget in the other window.
EB: The second window should not be automatically brought to the front when using the first window, unless the user explicitly interacts with it or some action navigates them to a widget in the second window.
SR: Ensure that the second window remains in the background when the user is interacting with the first window, unless they specifically choose to bring it to the front or perform an action that requires navigating to a widget in the second window.
